about_the_game:
Expand your collection of scale model kits with this new DLC pack!

Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1 contains four new models: a tank, plane, fantasy figurine, and a boat! Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

NEW MODELS


Continue an epic journey in the scale modeling world! Inside this DLC pack, you will find four new scale model kits:

Tank - M26 Pershing
Boat - PT-109
Plane - Hurricane Fighter Plane
Figurine - Astrocat

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task to complete and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing five new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
detailed_description:
Expand your collection of scale model kits with this new DLC pack!

Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1 contains four new models: a tank, plane, fantasy figurine, and a boat! Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

NEW MODELS


Continue an epic journey in the scale modeling world! Inside this DLC pack, you will find four new scale model kits:

Tank - M26 Pershing
Boat - PT-109
Plane - Hurricane Fighter Plane
Figurine - Astrocat

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task to complete and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing five new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
name: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

short_description: Model Builder: Expansion Pack no.1 contains four new models: a tank, plane, fantasy figurine, and a boat! Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
